verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from the plains <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah, <S%H6449><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is over <S%H5921><s%> against <S%H6440><s%> Jericho. <S%H3405><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H7200><s%> him <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> <S%H853><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Dan, <S%H1835><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the utmost <S%H314><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%>

And the south, <S%H5045><s%> and the plain <S%H3603><s%> of the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of palm trees, <S%H8558><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Zoar. <S%H6820><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, This <S%H2063><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto Abraham, <S%H85><s%> unto Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and unto Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> it unto thy seed: <S%H2233><s%> I have caused thee to see <S%H7200><s%> it with thine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> but thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> go over <S%H5674><s%> thither. <S%H8033><s%>

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> according to <S%H5921><s%> the word <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And he buried <S%H6912><s%> him in a valley <S%H1516><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Beth-peor: <S%H1047><s%> but no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> of <S%H853><s%> his sepulcher <S%H6900><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he died: <S%H4194><s%> his eye <S%H5869><s%> was not dim, <S%H3543><s%> <S%H3808><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> his natural force <S%H3893><s%> abated. <S%H5127><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> for <S%H853><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> so the days <S%H3117><s%> of weeping <S%H1065><s%> and mourning <S%H60><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> were ended. <S%H8552><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> was full <S%H4392><s%> of the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of wisdom; <S%H2451><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> had laid <S%H5564><s%> <S%H853><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, and did <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And there arose <S%H6965><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> since <S%H5750><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> like unto Moses, <S%H4872><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to <S%H413><s%> face, <S%H6440><s%>

In all <S%H3605><s%> the signs <S%H226><s%> and the wonders, <S%H4159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> him to do <S%H6213><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> his land, <S%H776><s%>

And in all <S%H3605><s%> that mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> terror <S%H4172><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> showed <S%H6213><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
